ygData.subject: Re: SV: Full Report!
ygData.msgSnippet: Kedge keep is not an itemized dungeon at this time. MoBs have level appropriate loot, but no unique or special items.  You can ask any GM and they will confirm
ygData.messageBody:
Kedge keep is not an itemized dungeon at this time. MoBs have level appropriate loot, but no unique or special items. You can ask
any GM and they will confirm this, if they bother to answer you. Brad has addressed this and promised it will be itemized by the
end of the month.

Andreas Sundgren wrote:But the Idea of searching under water sounds possible, I mean, how many people have actually been in places
like Kedge Keep...

--Eron
aeron@...

from The Simpsons:

Homer: Animals are crapping in our houses, and we're picking it up. Did we lose a war?? That's not America. That's not even
Mexico.
